title: Shaq Encourages Fans To Meme His Fall
teaser: Shaquille O'Neal was on the TNT network when he got up from his chair, tripped and fell. One meme Shaq re-tweeted shows him on his back with boxer Floyd Mayweather raising his right arm up in victory.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
